column1: The '''Gifts of Galadriel''' were items [[Galadriel]] gave to the [[Fellowship of the Ring]] on [[16 February]] {{TA
column3: Great}}</ref> to aid them in their journey.

column1: Before the parting feast, the [[Galadhrim]] gave the members of the Fellowship these items:
At the parting feast, Galadriel presented specific gifts to each member of the Fellowship:

column2: Galadhrim bow]] strung with elf hair and arrows for [[Legolas]]

small grey wooden box]] with a silver rune "G for Galadriel". Inside the box was earth from Galadriel's orchard. The box also contained a silver nut from a [[Mallorn]] tree, the last east of the sea and west of the mountains. This was given to Sam.
Three strands of Galadriel's hair]] for [[Gimli]]
